TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed Path extends System.Object
public ref class Path abstract sealed

summary.span: 在含有檔案或目錄路徑資訊的 執行個體上執行作業。

span.span: Performs operations on instances that contain file or directory path information.

summary.span: 這些作業是以跨平台方式來執行的。

span.span: These operations are performed in a cross-platform manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 不支援直接存取實體磁碟，透過路徑的裝置名稱，例如"\\\\。 \PHYSICALDRIVE0"。The .NET Framework does not support direct access to physical disks through paths that are device names, such as "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ". 路徑是提供的檔案或目錄位置的字串。A path is a string that provides the location of a file or directory. 路徑不一定是指向磁碟; 上的位置例如，路徑可能會對應到記憶體中或是在裝置上的位置。A path does not necessarily point to a location on disk; for example, a path might map to a location in memory or on a device. 確切路徑的格式取決於目前的平台。The exact format of a path is determined by the current platform. 比方說，某些系統上，路徑可以開始為磁碟機或磁碟區的代號，而這個項目就不會出現在其他系統。For example, on some systems, a path can start with a drive or volume letter, while this element is not present in other systems. 某些系統檔案的路徑可以包含擴充功能，表示儲存在檔案中的資訊類型。On some systems, file paths can contain extensions, which indicate the type of information stored in the file. 格式檔案是副檔名的平台而定;例如，某些系統限制擴充到三個字元，而有些不。The format of a file name extension is platform-dependent; for example, some systems limit extensions to three characters, and others do not. 目前的平台也會決定一組字元用來分隔的項目路徑，以及一組指定的路徑時，無法使用的字元。The current platform also determines the set of characters used to separate the elements of a path, and the set of characters that cannot be used when specifying paths. 由於這些差異的欄位`Path`類別的某些成員的確切行為及`Path`類別是平台而異。Because of these differences, the fields of the `Path` class as well as the exact behavior of some members of the `Path` class are platform-dependent. 路徑可以包含絕對或相對的位置資訊。A path can contain absolute or relative location information. 完整指定絕對路徑的位置： 檔案或目錄可以唯一識別目前的位置無關。Absolute paths fully specify a location: the file or directory can be uniquely identified regardless of the current location. 相對路徑指定的部分位置： 時尋找檔案，以相對路徑來指定目前位置用作為起始點。Relative paths specify a partial location: the current location is used as the starting point when locating a file specified with a relative path. 若要判斷目前的目錄，請呼叫。To determine the current directory, call . 大部分成員`Path`類別不會與檔案系統互動，並且不會驗證指定的路徑字串的檔案是否存在。Most members of the `Path` class do not interact with the file system and do not verify the existence of the file specified by a path string. `Path` 類別成員，以修改路徑的字串，例如，在檔案系統中有不會影響的檔案名稱。`Path` class members that modify a path string, such as , have no effect on names of files in the file system. `Path` 成員，不過，驗證指定的路徑字串的內容，並擲回例外狀況，如果字串包含不是有效的路徑字串中從傳回的字元所定義的字元方法。`Path` members do, however, validate the contents of a specified path string, and throw an exception if the string contains characters that are not valid in path strings, as defined in the characters returned from the method. 例如，在 Windows 架構桌面平台上無效路徑字元可能會包含引號 （"）、 小於 (\<)、 大於 (>)、 管道 (|)、 退格鍵 (\b)、 null (\0)，並透過 18 和 20-25 的 Unicode 字元 16。For example, on Windows-based desktop platforms, invalid path characters might include quote ("), less than (\<), greater than (>), pipe (|), backspace (\b), null (\0), and Unicode characters 16 through 18 and 20 through 25. 成員`Path`類別可讓您快速且輕鬆地執行一般作業，例如判斷檔案的副檔名是否為路徑的一部分，以及將兩個字串結合成一個路徑名稱。The members of the `Path` class enable you to quickly and easily perform common operations such as determining whether a file name extension is part of a path, and combining two strings into one path name. 所有成員`Path`類別是靜態的而且因此不需要路徑的執行個體呼叫。All members of the `Path` class are static and can therefore be called without having an instance of a path. > [!NOTE] > 在接受的路徑做為輸入字串的成員，該路徑必須是格式正確，或例外狀況。In members that accept a path as an input string, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised. 比方說，如果路徑是完整的但以空格開頭，路徑不被修剪中類別的方法。For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space, the path is not trimmed in methods of the class. 因此，路徑的格式不正確，而且會引發例外狀況。Therefore, the path is malformed and an exception is raised. 同樣地，路徑的組合不被完整的兩倍。Similarly, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice. 例如，"c:\temp c:\windows 」 也會引發例外狀況在大部分情況下。For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception in most cases. 請確定您的路徑是語式正確的當您使用接受路徑字串的方法。Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string. 接受路徑的成員，在路徑可以參考到檔案或只是目錄。In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory. 指定的路徑也可以參考相對路徑或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑的伺服器和共用的名稱。The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name. 例如，下列所有條件都是可接受的路徑：For example, all the following are acceptable paths: - "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt"。"c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic. - "c:\\\MyDir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。"c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic. - 「 MyDir\\\MySubdir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。"MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic. - 「\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare 」 在 C# 中，或 「\\\MyServer\MyShare 「 在 Visual Basic 中。"\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic. 因為所有這些作業會執行字串，就無法確認結果是在所有案例中有效。Because all these operations are performed on strings, it is impossible to verify that the results are valid in all scenarios. 例如，方法會剖析字串傳遞給它，並傳回該字串的副檔名。For example, the method parses a string that you pass to it and returns the extension from that string. 不過，這不表示該副檔名的檔案存在磁碟上。However, this does not mean that a file with that extension exists on the disk. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範一些主要成員`Path`類別。The following code example demonstrates some of the main members of the `Path` class. summary.span: 提供平台特定替代字元，用以在反映階層式檔案系統組織的路徑字串中分隔目錄層級。

span.span: Provides a platform-specific alternate character used to separate directory levels in a path string that reflects a hierarchical file system organization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存在此欄位中的字元不能在。The character stored in this field cannot be in . 這個欄位可以設定為相同的值。This field can be set to the same value as . `AltDirectorySeparatorChar` 和都適用於分隔目錄層級的路徑字串中。`AltDirectorySeparatorChar` and are both valid for separating directory levels in a path string. 這個欄位的值是正斜線 （'/') 在 Windows、 UNIX 和 Macintosh 作業系統上。The value of this field is a slash ('/') on Windows, UNIX and Macintosh operating systems. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用`AltDirectorySeparatorChar`欄位。The following code example demonstrates a use of the `AltDirectorySeparatorChar` field. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有`path`也`extension`包含句點 （.）、`ChangeExtension`加入句號。If neither `path` nor `extension` contains a period (.), `ChangeExtension` adds the period. `extension`參數可以包含多個句號和任何有效的路徑字元，而且可以任何長度。The `extension` parameter can contain multiple periods and any valid path characters, and can be any length. 如果`extension`是`null`，傳回的字串包含的內容`path`與最後一個期間和之後的所有字元移除。If `extension` is `null`, the returned string contains the contents of `path` with the last period and all characters following it removed. 如果`extension`為空字串，傳回的路徑字串中包含的內容`path`移除最後一個句點之後的任何字元。If `extension` is an empty string, the returned path string contains the contents of `path` with any characters following the last period removed. 如果`path`並未擴充功能和`extension`不`null`，傳回的字串包含`path`後面`extension`。If `path` does not have an extension and `extension` is not `null`, the returned string contains `path` followed by `extension`. 如果`extension`不`null`，而且不包含前置的句點，期間加入。If `extension` is not `null` and does not contain a leading period, the period is added. 如果`path`包含多個句號隔開，多個延伸模組傳回的字串包含的內容`path`與最後一個期間和之後的所有字元取代`extension`。If `path` contains a multiple extension separated by multiple periods, the returned string contains the contents of `path` with the last period and all characters following it replaced by `extension`. 例如，如果`path`是 「 \Dir1\examples\pathtests.csx.txt"和`extension`"cs"，修改過的路徑是"\Dir1\examples\pathtests.csx.cs"。For example, if `path` is "\Dir1\examples\pathtests.csx.txt" and `extension` is "cs", the modified path is "\Dir1\examples\pathtests.csx.cs". 您不可以確認傳回的結果會在所有案例中有效。It is not possible to verify that the returned results are valid in all scenarios. 例如，如果`path`是空的`extension`附加。For example, if `path` is empty, `extension` is appended. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks `paths` 應該是路徑的要合併部分的陣列。`paths` should be an array of the parts of the path to combine. 如果其中一個後續的路徑是絕對路徑，然後合併操作會重設開頭的絕對路徑，並捨棄所有先前合併的路徑。If the one of the subsequent paths is an absolute path, then the combine operation resets starting with that absolute path, discarding all previous combined paths. 合併的路徑會省略零長度字串。Zero-length strings are omitted from the combined path. 如果有空格，不會剖析參數。The parameters are not parsed if they have white space. 並非所有的目錄和檔案名稱無效的字元會解譯為無法接受由`Combine`方法，因為您可以使用這些字元的搜尋萬用字元。Not all invalid characters for directory and file names are interpreted as unacceptable by the `Combine` method, because you can use these characters for search wildcard characters. 例如，雖然`Path.Combine("c:\\", "*.txt")`可能無效如果您是從它建立檔案，則它是有效的搜尋字串。For example, while `Path.Combine("c:\\", "*.txt")` might be invalid if you were to create a file from it, it is valid as a search string. 它會因此成功經過解譯`Combine`方法。It is therefore successfully interpreted by the `Combine` method. ## Examples 下列範例會結合為一個路徑的字串陣列。The following example combines an array of strings into a path. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`path1`不是磁碟機參照 （亦即，"C:"或"D:"） 和結尾不是有效的分隔符號字元如中所定義， ，或，附加至`path1`之前串連。If `path1` is not a drive reference (that is, "C:" or "D:") and does not end with a valid separator character as defined in , , or , is appended to `path1` before concatenation. 如果`path2`不包含根目錄 (例如，如果`path2`開頭不是分隔符號字元或磁碟機規格)，結果是串連兩個路徑中, 介的分隔符號字元。If `path2` does not include a root (for example, if `path2` does not start with a separator character or a drive specification), the result is a concatenation of the two paths, with an intervening separator character. 如果`path2`包含根，`path2`傳回。If `path2` includes a root, `path2` is returned. 如果有空格，不會剖析參數。The parameters are not parsed if they have white space. 因此，如果`path2`包含泛空白字元 (例如，"\file.txt")，方法會附加`path2`至`path1`而不是只傳回`path2`。Therefore, if `path2` includes white space (for example, " \file.txt "), the method appends `path2` to `path1` instead of returning only `path2`. 並非所有的目錄和檔案名稱無效的字元會解譯為無法接受由`Combine`方法，因為您可以使用這些字元的搜尋萬用字元。Not all invalid characters for directory and file names are interpreted as unacceptable by the `Combine` method, because you can use these characters for search wildcard characters. 例如，雖然`Path.Combine("c:\\", "*.txt")`可能無效如果您是從它建立檔案，則它是有效的搜尋字串。For example, while `Path.Combine("c:\\", "*.txt")` might be invalid if you were to create a file from it, it is valid as a search string. 它會因此成功經過解譯`Combine`方法。It is therefore successfully interpreted by the `Combine` method. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`Combine`Windows 架構桌面平台上的方法。The following code example demonstrates using the `Combine` method on a Windows-based desktop platform. remarks.format: ## Remarks `path1` 應該是絕對路徑 (例如，"d:\archives"或"\\\archives\public")。`path1` should be an absolute path (for example, "d:\archives" or "\\\archives\public"). 如果`path2`或`path3`也是絕對路徑，合併作業捨棄所有先前合併的路徑和重設為絕對路徑。If `path2` or `path3` is also an absolute path, the combine operation discards all previously combined paths and resets to that absolute path. 合併的路徑會省略零長度字串。Zero-length strings are omitted from the combined path. 如果`path1`不是磁碟機參照 （亦即，"C:"或"D:"） 和結尾不是有效的分隔符號字元如中所定義， ，或，附加至`path1`之前串連。If `path1` is not a drive reference (that is, "C:" or "D:") and does not end with a valid separator character as defined in , , or , is appended to `path1` before concatenation. 如果`path2`不包含根目錄 (例如，如果`path2`開頭不是分隔符號字元或磁碟機規格)，結果是串連兩個路徑中, 介的分隔符號字元。If `path2` does not include a root (for example, if `path2` does not start with a separator character or a drive specification), the result is a concatenation of the two paths, with an intervening separator character. 如果`path2`包含根，`path2`傳回。If `path2` includes a root, `path2` is returned. 如果有空格，不會剖析參數。The parameters are not parsed if they have white space. 因此，如果`path2`包含泛空白字元 (例如，"\file.txt")，方法會附加`path2`至`path1`。Therefore, if `path2` includes white space (for example, " \file.txt "), the method appends `path2` to `path1`. 並非所有的目錄和檔案名稱無效的字元會解譯為無法接受由`Combine`方法，因為您可以使用這些字元的搜尋萬用字元。Not all invalid characters for directory and file names are interpreted as unacceptable by the `Combine` method, because you can use these characters for search wildcard characters. 例如，雖然`Path.Combine("c:\\", "*.txt")`可能無效如果您是從它建立檔案，則它是有效的搜尋字串。For example, while `Path.Combine("c:\\", "*.txt")` might be invalid if you were to create a file from it, it is valid as a search string. 它會因此成功經過解譯`Combine`方法。It is therefore successfully interpreted by the `Combine` method. ## Examples 下列範例會結合三個路徑。The following example combines three paths. remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 不支援直接存取實體磁碟，透過路徑的裝置名稱，例如"\\\\。 \PHYSICALDRIVE0"。The .NET Framework does not support direct access to physical disks through paths that are device names, such as "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ". 絕對路徑中包含的系統上尋找檔案或目錄所需的所有資訊。The absolute path includes all information required to locate a file or directory on a system. 指定檔案或目錄的`path`不需要存在。The file or directory specified by `path` is not required to exist. 例如，如果 c:\temp\newdir 是目前的目錄，則呼叫`GetFullPath`檔案名稱，例如 test.txt 傳回 c:\temp\newdir\test.txt。For example, if c:\temp\newdir is the current directory, calling `GetFullPath` on a file name such as test.txt returns c:\temp\newdir\test.txt. 檔案必須存在。The file need not exist. 不過，如果`path`存在，呼叫端必須具有要取得的路徑資訊的權限`path`。However, if `path` does exist, the caller must have permission to obtain path information for `path`. 請注意，不同於大部分類別，這個方法會存取檔案系統。Note that unlike most members of the class, this method accesses the file system. 這個方法會使用目前的目錄和目前的磁碟區資訊來完整限定`path`。This method uses current directory and current volume information to fully qualify `path`. 如果您指定的檔案名稱僅在`path`，`GetFullPath`傳回目前目錄的完整的路徑。If you specify a file name only in `path`, `GetFullPath` returns the fully qualified path of the current directory. 如果您要傳入的短檔名，它會展開長檔名。If you pass in a short file name, it is expanded to a long file name. 如果路徑不包含任何有效字元是無效除非它包含一或多個"。"字元後面接著任何數目的空格，則它會剖析為"。".."。If a path contains no significant characters it is invalid unless it contains one or more "." characters followed by any number of spaces, then it will be parsed as either "." or "..". 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範`GetFullPath`Windows 架構桌面平台上的方法。The following code example demonstrates the `GetFullPath` method on a Windows-based desktop platform. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會確認此路徑或檔案名稱存在。This method does not verify that the path or file name exists. 這個方法所傳回的字串模式可能如下所示：Possible patterns for the string returned by this method are as follows: - 空字串 (`path`目前的磁碟機或磁碟區上指定的相對路徑)。An empty string (`path` specified a relative path on the current drive or volume). - "/"(`path`指定目前的磁碟機上的絕對路徑)。"/" (`path` specified an absolute path on the current drive). - "X": (`path`指定為相對路徑上的磁碟機，其中 X 代表磁碟機或磁碟區代號)。"X:" (`path` specified a relative path on a drive, where X represents a drive or volume letter). - "X: /"(`path`指定絕對路徑指定磁碟機上)。"X:/" (`path` specified an absolute path on a given drive). - 「\\\ComputerName\SharedFolder 」 （UNC 路徑）。"\\\ComputerName\SharedFolder" (a UNC path). .NET Framework 不支援直接存取實體磁碟，透過路徑的裝置名稱，例如"\\\\。 \PHYSICALDRIVE0"。The .NET Framework does not support direct access to physical disks through paths that are device names, such as "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ". 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用`GetPathRoot`方法。The following code example demonstrates a use of the `GetPathRoot` method. TMP 環境變數所指定的路徑。The path specified by the TMP environment variable. 2. TEMP 環境變數所指定的路徑。The path specified by the TEMP environment variable. 3. 使用者設定檔環境變數所指定的路徑。The path specified by the USERPROFILE environment variable. 4. Windows 目錄。The Windows directory. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何呼叫 方法。The following code shows how to call the method. ```vb result As String = Path.GetTempPath() Console.WriteLine(result) ``` ```csharp string result = Path.GetTempPath(); Console.WriteLine(result); ``` 這個範例會產生類似下列的輸出。This example produces output similar to the following. ``` C:\Users\UserName\AppData\Local\Temp\ ```

summary.span: 提供平台特定磁碟區分隔符號字元。

span.span: Provides a platform-specific volume separator character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位的值是在 Windows 和 Macintosh，以及 UNIX 作業系統上的斜線 （/） 的冒號 （:）。The value of this field is a colon (:) on Windows and Macintosh, and a slash (/) on UNIX operating systems. 這是最適合用來剖析路徑，例如"c:\windows 」 或 「 MacVolume:System 資料夾 」。This is most useful for parsing paths such as "c:\windows" or "MacVolume:System Folder". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`VolumeSeparatorChar`欄位。The following code example demonstrates the use of the `VolumeSeparatorChar` field.
